Product

Kinetic Ops Dashboard

Real-time monitoring suite for an industrial robotics team with inertial navigation between bays.

Astro Next.js tRPC Tailwind CSS Zustand

Role

Product engineer and design partner

Outcome

Incident acknowledgment time dropped by 28%, and operators requested that we roll the new system out across three additional plants.

Key metrics

  • MTTA 28% faster
  • Operator satisfaction 4.6 / 5

Links

  • Case study ->

Systems thinking

The team manages dozens of tops (robots) across multiple bays. We aligned the UX with the mental model by making each bay a card with real-time telemetry, spin-down states, and escalation shortcuts.

Contributions

  • Architected the telemetry pipeline with WebSockets and graceful degradation to SSE
  • Co-designed the interaction model so velocity-based gestures felt intuitive with gloves on
  • Created MDX powered runbooks so ops could document clashes and resolutions inline

Result

Deployment shipped with zero downtime, and the same codebase now powers digital signage and the executive overview mode.

Problem

Operators struggled to triage incidents quickly because the legacy UI was static and slow to surface context.

Insight

By mapping gestures to velocity and aligning visuals with the physical system, we could reduce cognitive load for technicians.

Approach

Astro for content, Next.js embedded for authenticated views, and a shared Tailwind token set so product and marketing shipped the same design language.

Result

Incident acknowledgment time dropped by 28%, and operators requested that we roll the new system out across three additional plants.
